# Devil's Eye (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level**: [[2nd Level Blackguard Spells|Blackguard 2]], [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[Diabolic (Domain)|Diabolic 2]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time**: 1 standard action

**Components**: V, S

**Range**: Personal

**Target**: You

**Duration**: 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Fiendish Codex II (WotC), pg. 101

*With a few words and a gesture, the darkness melts away, and you can see with perfect clarity.*

You gain the visual acuity of a devil. You can see in darkness and magical darkness out to 30 feet.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Supercedes version from the *Book of Vile Darkness.*
